AlwaysCompileLoopMethods.description: When using recompilation, never interpret methods

ReduceNumberOfCompilerThreads.description: Reduce the number of parallel compiler threads when they

ReduceSignalUsage.description: Reduce the use of OS signals in Java and/or the VM

ReferencesPerThread.description: Ergonomically start one thread for this amount of

RegisterReferences.description: Tell whether the VM should register soft/weak/final/phantom

RelaxAccessControlCheck.description: Relax the access control checks in the verifier

RepeatCompilation.description: Repeat compilation without installing code (number of times)

ReplayCompiles.description: Enable replay of compilations from ReplayDataFile

ReplayIgnoreInitErrors.description: Ignore exceptions thrown during initialization for replay

ReplayReduce.description: Enable features to facilitate replay file reduction

ReplaySuppressInitializers.description: Control handling of class initialization during replay:

ReservedCodeCacheSize.description: Reserved code cache size (in bytes) - maximum code cache size

RestoreMXCSROnJNICalls.description: Restore MXCSR when returning from JNI calls

RewriteBytecodes.description: Allow rewriting of bytecodes (bytecodes are not immutable)

RewriteFrequentPairs.description: Rewrite frequently used bytecode pairs into a single bytecode

SafepointALot.description: Generate a lot of safepoints. This works with

SafepointTimeout.description: Time out and warn or fail after SafepointTimeoutDelay

ScavengeALotInterval.description: Interval between which scavenge will occur with +ScavengeALot

ScavengeRootsInCode.description: 0: do not allow scavengable oops in the code cache;

SelfDestructTimer.description: Will cause VM to terminate after a given time

SerializeVMOutput.description: Use a mutex to serialize output to tty and LogFile

ServiceThreadCleanupInterval.description: Wake the ServiceThread to do periodic cleanup checks every so

ShowCarrierFrames.description: show virtual threads' carrier frames in exceptions

ShowCodeDetailsInExceptionMessages.description: Show exception messages from RuntimeExceptions that contain

ShowHiddenFrames.description: show method handle implementation frames (usually hidden)

ShowMessageBoxOnError.description: Keep process alive on VM fatal error

ShowRegistersOnAssert.description: On internal errors, include registers in error report.

SimulateFullAddressSpace.description: Simulates a very populated, fragmented address space; no

SkipTier2IfPossible.description: Compile at tier 4 instead of tier 2 in training replay

SoftMaxHeapSize.description: Soft limit for maximum heap size (in bytes)

SoftRefLRUPolicyMSPerMB.description: Number of milliseconds per MB of free space in the heap

SpecTrapLimitExtraEntries.description: Extra method data trap entries for speculation

StackPrintLimit.description: number of stack frames to print in VM-level stack dump

StackRedPages.description: Number of red zone (unrecoverable overflows) pages of size

StackShadowPages.description: Number of shadow zone (for overflow checking) pages of size

StackYellowPages.description: Number of yellow zone (recoverable overflows) pages of size

StartAttachListener.description: Always start Attach Listener at VM startup

StressCodeBuffers.description: Exercise code buffer expansion and other rare state changes

StressLdcRewrite.description: Force ldc -> ldc_w rewrite during RedefineClasses.

StressSecondarySupers.description: Use a terrible hash function in order to generate many collisions.

StringDeduplicationAgeThreshold.description: A string must reach this age (or be promoted to an old region)

StringDeduplicationGrowTableLoad.description: Entries per bucket above which the table should be expanded

StringTableSize.description: Number of buckets in the interned String table

SweeperThreshold.description: Threshold when a code cache unloading GC is invoked.

SymbolTableSize.description: Number of buckets in the JVM internal Symbol table

TestCrashInErrorHandler.description: If > 0, provokes an error inside VM error handler (a secondary

TestSafeFetchInErrorHandler.description: If true, tests SafeFetch inside error handler.

TestUnresponsiveErrorHandler.description: If true, simulates an unresponsive error handler.

Tier4MinInvocationThreshold.description: Minimum invocation to compile at tier 4

TieredOldPercentage.description: Percentage over tier 3 thresholds after which a method is

TimeOopMap.description: Time calls to GenerateOopMap::compute_map() in sum

TraceBytecodesAt.description: Trace bytecodes starting with specified bytecode number

TraceCompilerThreads.description: Trace creation and removal of compiler threads

TrimNativeHeapInterval.description: Interval, in ms, at which the JVM will trim the native heap if

TrustFinalNonStaticFields.description: trust final non-static declarations for constant folding

TypeProfileArgsLimit.description: max number of call arguments to consider for type profiling

TypeProfileCasts.description: treat casts like calls for purposes of type profiling

TypeProfileLevel.description: =XYZ, with Z: Type profiling of arguments at call;

TypeProfileParmsLimit.description: max number of incoming parameters to consider for type profiling

TypeProfileWidth.description: Number of receiver types to record in call/cast profile

UncommonNullCast.description: track occurrences of null in casts; adjust compiler tactics

UnguardOnExecutionViolation.description: Unguard page and retry on no-execute fault (Win32 only)

UnlockDiagnosticVMOptions.description: Enable normal processing of flags relating to field diagnostics

UnlockExperimentalVMOptions.description: Enable normal processing of flags relating to experimental

UseAES.description: Control whether AES instructions are used when available

UseAESCTRIntrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for the paralleled version of AES/CTR crypto

UseAESIntrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for AES versions of crypto

UseAdaptiveNUMAChunkSizing.description: Enable adaptive chunk sizing for NUMA

UseBootstrapCallInfo.description: 0: when resolving InDy or ConDy, force all BSM arguments to be

UseChaCha20Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for the vectorized version of ChaCha20

UseCodeCacheFlushing.description: Remove cold/old nmethods from the code cache

UseCompactObjectHeaders.description: Use compact 64-bit object headers in 64-bit VM

UseCondCardMark.description: Check for already marked card before updating card table

UseContinuationFastPath.description: Use fast-path frame walking in continuations

UseCriticalCompilerThreadPriority.description: Compiler thread(s) run at critical scheduling priority

UseCriticalJavaThreadPriority.description: Java thread priority 10 maps to critical scheduling priority

UseDebuggerErgo.description: Debugging Only: Adjust the VM to be more debugger-friendly.

UseDebuggerErgo1.description: Debugging Only: Enable workarounds for debugger induced

UseDebuggerErgo2.description: Debugging Only: Limit the number of spawned JVM threads

UseDilithiumIntrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for the vectorized version of Dilithium

UseDynamicNumberOfCompilerThreads.description: Dynamically choose the number of parallel compiler threads

UseDynamicNumberOfGCThreads.description: Dynamically choose the number of threads up to a maximum of

UseFMA.description: Control whether FMA instructions are used when available

UseFastSignatureHandlers.description: Use fast signature handlers for native calls

UseFastUnorderedTimeStamps.description: Use platform unstable time where supported for timestamps only

UseGCOverheadLimit.description: Use policy to limit of proportion of time spent in GC

UseGHASHIntrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for GHASH versions of crypto

UseInlineCaches.description: Use Inline Caches for virtual calls

UseKyberIntrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for the vectorized version of Kyber

UseLargePagesIndividualAllocation.description: Allocate large pages individually for better affinity

UseLoopCounter.description: Increment invocation counter on backward branch

UseMD5Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for MD5 crypto hash function

UseNUMAInterleaving.description: Interleave memory across NUMA nodes if available

UseNewCode.description: Testing Only: Use the new version while testing

UseNewCode2.description: Testing Only: Use the new version while testing

UseNewCode3.description: Testing Only: Use the new version while testing

UseObjectMonitorTable.description: Use a table to record inflated monitors rather than the first

UseOnStackReplacement.description: Use on stack replacement, calls runtime if invoc. counter

UsePerfData.description: Flag to disable jvmstat instrumentation for performance testing

UseSHA.description: Control whether SHA instructions are used when available

UseSHA1Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-1 crypto hash function.

UseSHA256Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-224 and SHA-256 crypto hash functions.

UseSHA3Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for SHA3 crypto hash function.

UseSHA512Intrinsics.description: Use intrinsics for SHA-384 and SHA-512 crypto hash functions.

UseSecondarySupersCache.description: Use secondary supers cache during subtype checks.

UseSecondarySupersTable.description: Use hash table to lookup secondary supers.

UseSignalChaining.description: Use signal-chaining to invoke signal handlers installed

UseSystemMemoryBarrier.description: Try to enable system memory barrier if supported by OS

UseThreadsLockThrottleLock.description: Use an extra lock during Thread start and exit to alleviate

UseTypeProfile.description: Check interpreter profile for historically monomorphic calls

UseUnalignedAccesses.description: Use unaligned memory accesses in Unsafe

UseXMMForArrayCopy.description: Use SSE2 MOVQ instruction for Arraycopy

UserThreadWaitAttemptsAtExit.description: The number of times to wait for user threads to stop executing

VMThreadPriority.description: The native priority at which the VM thread should run

Verbose.description: Print additional debugging information from other modes

VerifyActivationFrameSize.description: Verify that activation frame didn't become smaller than its

VerifyAdapterSharing.description: Verify that the code for shared adapters is the equivalent

VerifyArchivedFields.description: Verify memory when archived oop fields are loaded from CDS;

VerifyBeforeIteration.description: Verify memory system before JVMTI iteration

VerifyCodeCache.description: Verify code cache on memory allocation/deallocation

VerifyCrossModifyFence.description: Mark all threads after a safepoint, and clear on a modify

VerifyDataPointer.description: Verify the method data pointer during interpreter profiling

VerifyDependencies.description: Exercise and verify the compilation dependency mechanism

VerifyDuringGC.description: Verify memory system during GC (between phases)

VerifyDuringStartup.description: Verify memory system before executing any Java code

VerifyGCStartAt.description: GC invoke count where +VerifyBefore/AfterGC kicks in

VerifyLastFrame.description: Verify oops on last frame on entry to VM

VerifyMethodHandles.description: perform extra checks when constructing method handles

VerifySecondarySupers.description: Check that linear and hashed secondary lookups return the same result.

VerifyStack.description: Verify stack of each thread when it is entering a runtime call

VerifyStackAtCalls.description: Verify that the stack pointer is unchanged after calls

WalkStackALot.description: Trace stack (no print) at every exit from the runtime system

WorkStealingHardSpins.description: Number of iterations in a spin loop between checks on

WorkStealingSleepMillis.description: Sleep time when sleep is used for yields

WorkStealingSpinToYieldRatio.description: Ratio of hard spins to calls to yield

WorkStealingYieldsBeforeSleep.description: Number of yields before a sleep is done during work stealing

YoungGenerationSizeIncrement.description: Adaptive size percentage change in young generation

YoungGenerationSizeSupplement.description: Supplement to YoungGenerationSizeIncrement used at startup

ZCollectionInterval.description: Force GC at a fixed time interval (in seconds).

ZCollectionIntervalMajor.description: Force GC at a fixed time interval (in seconds)

ZCollectionIntervalMinor.description: Force Minor GC at a fixed time interval (in seconds)

ZCollectionIntervalOnly.description: Only use timers for GC heuristics

ZFailLargerCommits.description: Commits larger than ZFailLargerCommits will be truncated,

ZFakeNUMA.description: ZFakeNUMA is used to test the internal NUMA memory support

ZForceDiscontiguousHeapReservations.description: The gc will attempt to split the heap reservation into this

ZIndexDistributorStrategy.description: Strategy used to distribute indices to parallel workers

ZOldGCThreads.description: Number of GC threads for the old generation

ZStatisticsInterval.description: Time between statistics print outs (in seconds)

ZStressFastMediumPageAllocation.description: Always use the minimum medium page size for fast medium page

ZTenuringThreshold.description: Young generation tenuring threshold, -1 for dynamic computation

ZUncommitDelay.description: Uncommit memory if it has been unused for the specified

ZYoungCompactionLimit.description: Maximum allowed garbage in young pages

ZYoungGCThreads.description: Number of GC threads for the young generation

ZombieALot.description: Create non-entrant nmethods at exit from the runtime system

ZombieALotInterval.description: Number of exits until ZombieALot kicks in
